DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate whether insulin sensitivity of the human brain correlates with insulin sensitivity of the liver.
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Sensitivity of the Brain in Pathogenesis of Diabetes Mellitus Type 2
DOC.criteria: Age 1870 Risk factor(s) for type 2 diabetes (e.g. overweight, family history of diabetes) Type 2 diabetes pregnancy acute or chronic diseases
